tool.name: msgf2pin
tool.description: Conversion of mzid output from MSGF+ to pin format for use with percolator.

param.name: matches
param.label: Number of Matches per PSM to Consider
param.help: How many matches to consider per spectrum?

param.name: ptm
param.label: Calculate feature for number of PTMs?

param.name: pngasef
param.label: PNGaseF Feature?
param.help: Calculate feature based on N-linked glycosylation pattern resulting from a PNGaseF treatment. (N[*].[ST])

param.name: isotope
param.label: Delta Mass to isotope or average?
param.help: Mass difference calculated to closest isotope mass rather than to the average mass.
